summary: SummaryEffortlessly smooth and add shine for salon results at home with the Onyx Ceramic Flat Iron from INFINITI PRO CONAIR. Onyx ceramic plates minimize frizz and maximize manageability, leaving hair with silky, mega shine after just one pass.
details: DetailsFeaturesUltra-high heat: Up to 455°F, perfect for thick hair textures and hard-to-style spots.Fast, consistent heat: True ceramic heater ensures the styler is ready for use in 15 seconds and maintains heat level for less damage.Heat for every hair type: Choose the right heat for you from 30 temperature settings.No stress: Automatic safety shutoff lets you style worry-free.Straight hair in a single pass: Large 1" plates smooth and shine for quick styling.BenefitsShine boost: Onyx ceramic reduces frizz for silky, high-shine results.Item 2280881

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Gets my hair very straight and doesnt make it frizzy or pull my hair!!

reviews.headline: I want this flat iron, but every time I order....
reviews.comments: I want this flat iron to replace this flat iron that I broke as I have just loved it1  But every time I order no matter the delivery method I am getting one with black plates that is ceramic vs titaneum!

reviews.headline: It's pretty bulky
reviews.comments:
It's OK, I've dealt with worse. It does give a burnt smell and it pulls my hair. It also keeps giving my hair that crimped look up by scalp I cant seem to get around fixing.
fixing.  This definitely isn't a use quick kind of tool. I think im better off with my cheap one.

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comments: I got the rainbow plated version of this flat iron for Christmas about 6 years ago. It recently stopped heating, so, loving it, I decided to buy this one because it was the same but with black plates. I got it home and turned it on to get ready for an event and it wouldn't heat up past the 1 setting and the red light just kept blinking. I waited 20 minutes and it still didn't heat up any. I went to exchange it and got another one. Used it once and then the same thing. I would not recommend buying unless you want to be disappointed and make 4 trips to Ulta to get something that doesn't even work.

reviews.headline: Mascara
reviews.comments: I bought a cheaper iron at a different store and ended up retuning it and bought this one.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I had the exact same brand but pink lasted me 4 years but had to replace it  with this one so far works great.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I had the exact same brand but pink lasted me 4 years but had to replace it  with this one so far works great.

reviews.headline: Not what I ordered.
reviews.comments: I ordered this product to replace the one I already had. I liked the rainbow plates because they were smooth and didn't snag my hair. The one I received has the black plates and is horrible. It doesn't heat up enough and it snags my hair. So disappointing.

reviews.headline: Don't recommend
reviews.comments: Always has a weird smell to it doesnt flat iron very well

reviews.headline: Love this thing down
reviews.comments: I love this flat iron! It heats quickly and you only need one pass. The downside is that it stopped working suddenly one day. It wouldnt hest up all the way and the light kept flashing. Other than that, it does an amazing job for my curly, somewhat coarse hair!

reviews.headline: Amazing hair straightener
reviews.comments: The hair straightener works very well on my type of hair.

reviews.headline: I would buy again and again
reviews.comments: Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: False advertising
reviews.comments: This straightener is NOT titanium plates. The smaller one on this page is, but the bigger one is ceramic. I bought it and came home and realized it is false advertising because the plates are ceramic. You cannot have the title titanium and it not be.

reviews.headline: This Works But That's It
reviews.comments: This straitener is fine, but thats it. The plates are not very smooth so I find myself getting crinkles/crimps because it gets stuck. I do also find that it doesn't close all the way when trying to do curls. So, the hair will fall out from between the plates when trying to finish a curl. Lastly, the plates extend all the way out so it you're not extremely careful you will burn your hands and melt your combs. Again, it works but I would not recommend or buy it again.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Love this straightner! My hair is very fine and this straightner does not pull or break it. I love that i can adjust the temperature to the perfect heat so it doesnt damage my hair. Definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Where has this been? ￼
reviews.comments: I have extremely thick very curly hair and this just made my hair straight and smooth faster than any other straightener I've had!

reviews.headline: Works great -great price too
reviews.comments: Thrilled with this flat iron. Flat iron newbie --only ever owned the $12 one from the store. But got a new haircut and wanted to try it again (since the cheap one was a fail!) This one works perfectly  AND quickly so I don't have to expose my hair to too much heat.  Easy to use -very happy with it. A great price too.

reviews.headline: Great alternative to babyliss Flat iron
reviews.comments: Great alternative to the high end titanium flat iron ! I was shocked since its conair but the design of this flat iron is beautiful . Not only does it gives me a salon finish, it gets my thick 4B-4C hair straight with one swipe! Definitely will recommend especially to the natural hair customers.

reviews.headline: Best purchase ever!
reviews.comments:
I have been using the wet to straight flat iron
 for the last 15 years, and I finally threw it away! I bought this straightener and it is the best purchase I have ever made. This straightener is by far amazing especially if you have thick hair.

reviews.headline: Durable, Fast, and Effecient
reviews.comments:
Purchased 5 years ago amd would buy again. The best straightener Ive had for my thick wavy hair and takes less time than many other straighteners Ive had. Over the years, the ceramic is still so smooth that I have not experienced any snagging. Its controllable temp allows to adjust to your needs. And the best part is this straightner creates the large curls I always love the way that I want it.
Its design is sleek and unique. Simple and easy to use. 
My first review and wanted to take the time and say thank you. Its on sale and my straightner is still working perfectly fine other wise Id snag this deal. Wish i got it on sale.

faceoff_positive.comments:
My Remington straightener died a couple days ago and I wanted to buy a nice titanium one because I use my straightener daily (for curling or straightening) and my ceramic one was KILLING my hair. I have had everything from CHI, Remington, and hot tools but I am so thankful I came across this affordable titanium coated one. I just used it for the first time and I am in love with it. No pulling on hair, glides very easily, and is easy on the eyes. The only thing I had a problem with was fly aways, but that is probably because I need some heat protectant or was curling my hair with it. 
If buying a titanium straightener isn't in your budget, this is the best straightener you will get for a nice price!
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVE this affordable straightener!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I like this product and it serves its purpose. For someone with fine hair who does not need high high heat, daily use and is on a budget it works wonderfully. However the plates do not close evenly across the iron. The only place the plates touch are at the tip of the iron, when you put hair through the plates it will still work like it is supposed to but can cause snagging or pulling of hair. Its easy to avoid as long as you're aware of the issue. If plates made even contact it would be the perfect tool.
faceoff_negative.headline: Works well for fine hair
